duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform plumbing repairs including leak location, water heater repair, water filtration, plumbing fixture repair, drain cleaning, and replacement.
Guide and train apprentice in plumbing techniques and best practices.
Utilize iPad and Service Titan software for communication and work management.
Provide exceptional customer service, diagnose plumbing issues, and effectively communicate repair solutions to customers.

education_certification.credential: Tradesman, Journeyman, or Masters Plumbing License
